amendment.description: To direct the FTC to develop a system for rewarding those who supply information about violations of this Act and a system for requiring ADV labeling on unsolicited commercial electronic mail.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1896 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1896 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Corzine. (consideration: CR S13040-13041; text: CR S13040) To direct the FTC to develop a system for rewarding those who supply information about violations of this Act and a system for requiring ADV labeling on unsolicited commercial electronic mail.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1896 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Corzine.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1896 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
